title: Remove unused method: short() from diff.rs
description: Method is used in output.rs:940. DO NOT REMOVE.

title: Remove unused method: symbols_by_type() from index.rs
description: Unused method at ./src/index.rs:196

title: Remove unused test functions from test_files/
description: Test files (example.c, sample.py, test.py) contain unused functions intentionally for parsing test coverage. These are sample data files, not actual tests.

title: Remove dead functions from git.rs
description: Removed list_files_at_commit() and get_commit_info() - never called, superseded by get_changed_files() and integrated logic

title: cm trace fails despite direct caller relationship
description: cm callers cmd_query returns main, but cm trace main cmd_query fails. BFS misses Rust match arm calls. Core feature broken.

title: cm query should default to fuzzy matching
description: Exact match default is counter-intuitive. Help says 'always use --fuzzy' but it's not the default. Invert to --exact flag.

title: cm query needs --limit flag
description: 100+ results blow agent context window. Add --limit N to cap output. High priority for token efficiency.

title: cm untested floods with markdown noise
description: Returns 200+ headings/code blocks from .md files. Real untested code buried. Add --code-only or exclude markdown by default.

title: cm diff needs file-level filtering
description: ALREADY WORKS: cm diff HEAD~3 src/main.rs filters correctly. Path parameter exists and is implemented. Close this as invalid - feature already exists.

title: cm callers/callees silent on nonexistent symbols
description: Returns 'No calls found' for both missing symbols AND symbols with no calls. Should distinguish: 'Symbol not found' vs 'No callers'.

title: Invalid flag values silently fallback
description: --format badformat warns but continues. --context invalid is silent. Both should error with valid options list.

title: cm snapshot/compare noisy with doc changes
description: Code block changes in markdown pollute diff output. Add --code-only or --symbol-types filter.

title: cm implements returns self-impls mixed with trait impls
description: ALREADY WORKS: --trait-only flag exists and filters inherent impls. 'cm implements Parser' shows 3 (including impl Parser), 'cm implements Parser --trait-only' shows 2 (only trait impls). Feature complete.

title: Add --format json for structured output
description: All formats are human-readable text. JSON enables reliable programmatic parsing for agent automation workflows.

title: cm test-deps confusing output for tests without imports
description: Valid test file with no external imports returns 'No production symbols'. Should clarify: 'Test has no external imports'.

title: Fast mode activation unclear
description: Help says auto-enables at 1000+ files but behavior unclear on small repos. Add --show-cache-info to stats.

title: cm query flag order confusing
description: Tried 'cm query find_untested --exact' but got error. Flag must come BEFORE symbol name. Natural to put flags after positional args. Consider: allow flags in any position OR improve error message to suggest correct placement.

title: cm callers/callees need --limit flag
description: cm query has --limit flag but callers/callees don't. These commands can also return huge output. Add --limit N flag to cap results for token efficiency.

title: cm query fails on Rust enum variants and command names
description: Tried 'cm query Implements' to find the Implements command struct but got 'No symbols found'. Tree-sitter doesn't index enum variants or command structs. Makes it hard to navigate clap Command enums. Consider indexing enum variants or add note in help.

title: Fix false negative in 'cm callers': Rust method calls not detected
description: cm callers symbols_by_type returns 0 results despite many usages in output.rs. likely an issue with cross-file method call resolution in callgraph.rs

title: cm query: --exact flag not accepted (clap arg missing?)
description: running  errors with 'unexpected argument --exact'. main.rs defines an exact flag for query, so binary and clap config are out of sync or arg declared incorrectly.

title: callers/callees/query: documented flags (--limit, --exact) are rejected by clap
description: dogfooding:  and  error 'unexpected argument --limit'. also  rejected. help text + main.rs struct suggest these should exist; binary/clap config likely diverged.

title: deps used-by is more reliable than callers rn; mismatch between text search and AST callgraph
description: dogfooding: deps --direction used-by finds 42 usages of symbols_by_type in output.rs, while callers finds 0. we should either fix rust method_call_expression in extract_rust_calls or clearly label callers as incomplete.

title: Verify P0 and P1 issues are real by dogfooding cm
--help
cm callers floods with results for common method names
description: searching for 'Calculator::new' doesn't work, must search bare name only. cannot disambiguate by class/struct. need class-aware symbol resolution.

title: m-2e72 is FALSE POSITIVE: documented flags work correctly
description: tested --limit and --exact flags with cm query and cm callers - both work. help text is correct. issue description outdated.
